data.title: History
data.meta_description: The PTI is a charity which provides a wide range of CPD courses for teachers focused on developing specialist subject knowledge.
data.text:
An incredible line up of History speakers, featuring:

Dr Tracy Borman | Dr Althea Legal-Miller | Simon Schama CBE FBA FRSL | Dan Snow MBE | Michael Wood OBE

Schedule

Mon 21 June 2021, 1400-1530

A lecture with Dan Snow

With Dan Snow MBE, Historian, Broadcaster and TV Presenter

Tue 22 June 2021, 1600-1730

The History wars – should they be fought in the classroom?

With Sir Simon Schama CBE FRA FRSL, Historian and TV Presenter

Thu 24 June 2021, 1600-1730

People power: The fight for civil rights in America 1955–present day

With Dr Althea Legal-Miller, Canterbury Christ Church University

Tue 29 June 2021, 1600-1730

The private lives of the Tudors

With Dr Tracy Borman, best-selling Author and Historian

Wed 30 June 2021, 1600-1730

China

With Michael Wood OBE, Historian and award-winning film maker

Thu 01 July 2021, 1600-1730

Taking the scenic route through the Renaissance: Using rich stories to build meaning in the History classroom

With Teacher Leader Jonathan Grande

Download the schedule here >>> Download the schedule

BOOK YOUR PLACE ON THE SERIES NOW
